name: Raquel Michelena
text: As always, pizza and calzone were wonderful.

name: Dorothy Young
text: Good food. I loved the gluten free pizza! I was so surprised by the taste that I decided to eat half the pizza there instead of taking it home. The atmosphere was family friendly and the staff seemed very friendly. I will definitely be back...soon.

name: Thomas F
text: The pizza is delicious. They really know what they‚Äôre doing food wise. However, when they tell you a pick-up order will be ready in 20 minutes, the expectation is that it‚Äôs ready. The reality is that my pizza was ready in 60 minutes. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Johnnie Crews
text: Great food. Great atmosphere. Great service. Had the best server, Catherinre,,. Have not had a server has good has her in a LONG TIME, Will defiantly go back.

name: B Spikes
text: We really enjoyed our lunch here today.  The staff accommodated us on the patio even tho it cold and rainy.  Service was awesome!  Our food came out quickly and was very good.

name: Sally Buglass
text: Friendly post voting chat with cute high school students running the take away orders!  We discussed my first voting experience when I voted for Jimmy Carter in his second, yet unsuccessful, Presidential campaign!  They knew about the Iran Hostage situation!  Go Dunwoody HS history department!

name: Mandy Gillis
text: Every single time I order to-go here they mess up my order. Even after they've "fixed it" a second time, they still haven't gotten my food correctly. ‚Ä¶More

name: La Treasa Banks
text: First time at this location. It was a carry out meal. Was ready when quoted. Nice staff clean restaurant.

name: Bob Pendley
text: Mellow has some of the best pizza on Atlanta. It is a little more dough than most, but all fresh ingredients.

name: Duane Nicolette
text: You can never go wrong with Mellow Mushroom, Fantastic Pizza and our waitress was amazing!

name: Jamie Phillips

text: Poor experience. Call order in and they said order would be ready in 25.  I think they new better than that and capitalizing on demand with covid. I waited curbside pickup for just shy of an hour.  I was not sure what to do. I called inside ‚Ä¶More

text: Great meal with a great friend...  The food was fabulous and the staff delightful.

text: This is our first time here at Mellow Mushroom and what a great experience. Cassandra provide us with great and the Manager Ben even looked to make sure all the sundae items were high fructose free for my friends daughter. The food was great and one of the best salads Ive had. Definitely will be returning.

name: Karthik D
text: Best pizza in Atlanta . We order veg thin crust pizza and some chicken wings . We abosultely loved the taste and freshness of vegetables with each bite with juicy drip . Its awesome !!!!!

name: Jennifer Klappich
text: So the inside seriously needs an update...big time. I get it‚Äôs supposed to have a specific look but it‚Äôs had that look since my family started going years and years ago. It‚Äôs also a bit of a dark environment. The pizza is good and I love their pretzels! The staff is nice and it‚Äôs pretty clean.

name: Brad McKnight
text: Always a good pizza. The Enlightened Salad and the Greek Salad are both good too. ‚Ä¶More

name: Barbara Land
text: House pizza is fantastic. Love their spinach salad too

name: Phil Spencer

name: James Napier
text: Great pizza in suburban Dunwoody! Love the crust and my picky daughter noted the great flavor of the sauce. We always do takeout but you can also sit if you like. Good stuff!

name: Jan Kutti
text: I'm gluten and dairy free. Their gluten free pizza was really good. The crust was crisp. The vegan mozzarella was also a welcome change. I've tried gluten free pizza elsewhere but since they don't have vegan cheese I usually opt for cheese ‚Ä¶More

text: Always a decent place to go for pizza and beer. Steak and cheese calzone today was wonderful

name: Kimball Toys
text: Delicious and the dining room is super clean and open for business!

name: R.C.
text: I was surprised that the food portions were as large as the were, especially after a previous bad experience. I gave the place a second chance and I'm glad it was better the second time around. However I sense a bit of a racists undertone. So the 3 stars is simply for the food. The service is par at best.

name: Chase Garrett
text: Slowest service ever, waited an hour and a half for one pizza.

text: The menu and service were ahead of our expectations. I really loved the vibes of this restaurant. Wonderful spot to take my family out for dinner.
